SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Context
ZeroMQ context.
Context.Version
Version information.
ContextOption
ZeroMQ context options.
Curve
CURVE encryption key utilities.
Curve.KeyPair
Represents a CURVE keypair.
LibZmq
Low-level bindings to libzmq using Java Foreign Function & Memory (FFM) API.
Message
ZeroMQ message.
MessageProperty
ZeroMQ message properties.
MultipartMessage
Helper for multipart messages.
NativeLoader
Utility class for loading the native libzmq library.
Poller
Instance-based polling for ZeroMQ sockets with optimized performance.
PollEvents
Events for polling operations.
Proxy
ZeroMQ proxy utilities.
Proxy.Commands
Proxy control commands for steerable proxies.
Proxy.Statistics
Proxy statistics returned by STATISTICS command.
RecvFlags
Flags for receive operations.
RecvResult<T>
Generic result of a receive operation following the cppzmq design pattern.
SendFlags
Flags for send operations.
SendResult
Result of a send operation following the cppzmq design pattern.
Socket
ZeroMQ socket.
SocketMonitorEvent
ZeroMQ socket monitor events.
SocketMonitorEventData
Represents ZeroMQ socket monitor event data parsed from monitor event messages.
SocketOption
ZeroMQ socket options.
SocketRef
Non-owning reference to a ZMQ socket.
SocketType
ZeroMQ socket types.
Z85
Z85 encoding/decoding utilities.
Z85.PaddedData
Represents data with padding information.
ZmqConstants
ZeroMQ constants for socket types, options, flags, and error codes.
ZmqException
Exception thrown when a ZeroMQ operation fails.
ZmqStructs
Memory layouts for ZeroMQ native structures.
ZmqStructs.PollItemOffsets
Provides byte offsets for fields in the zmq_pollitem_t structure.
